</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Create-the-dictionary-for-both-source-and-target-languages.">Create the dictionary for both source and target languages.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Create-the-dictionary-for-both-source-and-target-languages.">¶</a></h3><p>Now we have to feed these source and the corresponding target sentences to our Encoder-Decoder Model. We cannot work directly with the text. Therefore, we need to map the captions to numerical vectors.</p>
<blockquote><p>To do this, an internal vocabulary(dictionary of words) from the list of texts must be constructed. This vocabulary should be constructed based on the word frequency. Now each sentence can be converted to sequence of integers based on this dictionary of words. So it basically takes each word in the text and replaces it with its corresponding integer value from the word-to-index dictionary.</p>
</blockquote>
<p>To accomplish this task, we used the sophisticated API provided by Keras that can be fit on multiple documents ---<strong>Tokenizer</strong>.</p>
<ul>
<li>fit_on_texts - Fits list of texts on the Tokenizer object and updates internal vocabulary based on a list of texts. Lower integer means more frequent word. 0 is reserved for padding.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="s2">"."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"data"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"fra-eng"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">version_name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"french_tokenizer.pkl"</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="s2">"."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"data"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"fra-eng"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">version_name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"english_tokenizer.pkl"</span>
<span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># train or load Tokenizers for encoder and decoder</span>
<span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">exists</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">exists</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Tokenizer</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">filters</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_on_texts</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"input"</span><span class="p">])</span>

    <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Tokenizer</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">filters</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fit_on_texts</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"<sos> "</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"target"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">" <eos>"</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"wb"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dump</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">protocol</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">HIGHEST_PROTOCOL</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"wb"</span><span class="p">,)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dump</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">protocol</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">HIGHEST_PROTOCOL</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"rb"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"rb"</span><span class="p">,)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div id="a9831e45-b873-44ed-9e5a-daa7ddeaf043"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_javascript">
<script type="text/javascript">
var element = $('#a9831e45-b873-44ed-9e5a-daa7ddeaf043');

            setTimeout(function() {
                var nbb_cell_id = 12;
                var nbb_unformatted_code = "encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path = os.path.join(\n    \".\", \"data\", \"fra-eng\", version_name, \"french_tokenizer.pkl\"\n)\ndecoder_tokenizer_pickle_path = os.path.join(\n    \".\", \"data\", \"fra-eng\", version_name, \"english_tokenizer.pkl\"\n)\n\n# train or load Tokenizers for encoder and decoder\nif (not os.path.exists(encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path)) or (\n    not os.path.exists(decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path)\n):\n\n    encoder_tokenizer = Tokenizer(filters=\"\")\n    encoder_tokenizer.fit_on_texts(data_texts[\"input\"])\n\n    decoder_tokenizer = Tokenizer(filters=\"\")\n    decoder_tokenizer.fit_on_texts(\"<sos> \" + data_texts[\"target\"] + \" <eos>\")\n\n    with open(encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"wb\") as handle:\n        pickle.dump(encoder_tokenizer, handle, protocol=pickle.HIGHEST_PROTOCOL)\n\n    with open(decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"wb\",) as handle:\n        pickle.dump(decoder_tokenizer, handle, protocol=pickle.HIGHEST_PROTOCOL)\n\nelse:\n\n    with open(encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"rb\") as handle:\n        encoder_tokenizer = pickle.load(handle)\n\n    with open(decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"rb\",) as handle:\n        decoder_tokenizer = pickle.load(handle)";
                var nbb_formatted_code = "encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path = os.path.join(\n    \".\", \"data\", \"fra-eng\", version_name, \"french_tokenizer.pkl\"\n)\ndecoder_tokenizer_pickle_path = os.path.join(\n    \".\", \"data\", \"fra-eng\", version_name, \"english_tokenizer.pkl\"\n)\n\n# train or load Tokenizers for encoder and decoder\nif (not os.path.exists(encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path)) or (\n    not os.path.exists(decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path)\n):\n\n    encoder_tokenizer = Tokenizer(filters=\"\")\n    encoder_tokenizer.fit_on_texts(data_texts[\"input\"])\n\n    decoder_tokenizer = Tokenizer(filters=\"\")\n    decoder_tokenizer.fit_on_texts(\"<sos> \" + data_texts[\"target\"] + \" <eos>\")\n\n    with open(encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"wb\") as handle:\n        pickle.dump(encoder_tokenizer, handle, protocol=pickle.HIGHEST_PROTOCOL)\n\n    with open(decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"wb\",) as handle:\n        pickle.dump(decoder_tokenizer, handle, protocol=pickle.HIGHEST_PROTOCOL)\n\nelse:\n\n    with open(encoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"rb\") as handle:\n        encoder_tokenizer = pickle.load(handle)\n\n    with open(decoder_tokenizer_pickle_path, \"rb\",) as handle:\n        decoder_tokenizer = pickle.load(handle)";
                var nbb_cells = Jupyter.notebook.get_cells();
                for (var i = 0; i < nbb_cells.length; ++i) {
                    if (nbb_cells[i].input_prompt_number == nbb_cell_id) {

                             nbb_cells[i].set_text(nbb_formatted_code);
                        }
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }, 500);
            
</script>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Word-to-Index-and-Index-to-Word-Mapping">Word to Index and Index to Word Mapping<a class="anchor-link" href="#Word-to-Index-and-Index-to-Word-Mapping">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># word to index and index to word mapping for encoder</span>
<span class="n">encoder_word2idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">word_index</span>
<span class="n">encoder_idx2word</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">reversed</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">encoder_word2idx</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">items</span><span class="p">()))</span>

<span class="c1"># word to index and index to word mapping for decoder</span>
<span class="n">decoder_word2idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">word_index</span>
<span class="n">decoder_idx2word</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">dict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">map</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">reversed</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">decoder_word2idx</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">items</span><span class="p">()))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div id="941fb390-c9e6-43c1-9d44-7b16268a2f0f"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_javascript">
<script type="text/javascript">
var element = $('#941fb390-c9e6-43c1-9d44-7b16268a2f0f');

            setTimeout(function() {
                var nbb_cell_id = 13;
                var nbb_unformatted_code = "# word to index and index to word mapping for encoder\nencoder_word2idx = encoder_tokenizer.word_index\nencoder_idx2word = dict(map(reversed, encoder_word2idx.items()))\n\n# word to index and index to word mapping for decoder\ndecoder_word2idx = decoder_tokenizer.word_index\ndecoder_idx2word = dict(map(reversed, decoder_word2idx.items()))";
                var nbb_formatted_code = "# word to index and index to word mapping for encoder\nencoder_word2idx = encoder_tokenizer.word_index\nencoder_idx2word = dict(map(reversed, encoder_word2idx.items()))\n\n# word to index and index to word mapping for decoder\ndecoder_word2idx = decoder_tokenizer.word_index\ndecoder_idx2word = dict(map(reversed, decoder_word2idx.items()))";

</script>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Total-number-of-words-in-source-and-target-dictionary">Total number of words in source and target dictionary<a class="anchor-link" href="#Total-number-of-words-in-source-and-target-dictionary">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">encoder_num_words</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_word2idx</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
<span class="n">logger</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">debug</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">"The length of the encoder tokenizer dictionary is : </span><span class="si">{encoder_num_words}</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">decoder_num_words</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_word2idx</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
<span class="n">logger</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">debug</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">"The length of the encoder tokenizer dictionary is : </span><span class="si">{decoder_num_words}</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

var element = $('#6a38f29d-3d00-4a3a-801d-dc1976b6709a');

                var nbb_formatted_code = "encoder_num_words = len(encoder_word2idx) + 1\nlogger.debug(f\"The length of the encoder tokenizer dictionary is : {encoder_num_words}\")\n\ndecoder_num_words = len(decoder_word2idx) + 1\nlogger.debug(f\"The length of the encoder tokenizer dictionary is : {decoder_num_words}\")";

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Calculate-Maximum-length-in-source-and-target-sentence">Calculate Maximum length in source and target sentence<a class="anchor-link" href="#Calculate-Maximum-length-in-source-and-target-sentence">¶</a></h3><p>To provides the fixed number of time steps to our encoder and decoder model we have to pad these sequence of numbers to maximum length. Therefore, we calculate the maximum length of sentences in both source as well as target language.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [15]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">max_length</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">desc1</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">length</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">sentence</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">desc1</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">length</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">word_tokenize</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sentence</span><span class="p">)))</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">max</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">length</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div id="676b4066-e129-4547-bf70-7c165331e22a"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_javascript">
<script type="text/javascript">
var element = $('#676b4066-e129-4547-bf70-7c165331e22a');

            setTimeout(function() {
                var nbb_cell_id = 15;
                var nbb_unformatted_code = "def max_length(desc1):\n    length = []\n    for sentence in desc1:\n        length.append(len(word_tokenize(sentence)))\n    return max(length)";
                var nbb_formatted_code = "def max_length(desc1):\n    length = []\n    for sentence in desc1:\n        length.append(len(word_tokenize(sentence)))\n    return max(length)";
                var nbb_cells = Jupyter.notebook.get_cells();
                for (var i = 0; i < nbb_cells.length; ++i) {
                    if (nbb_cells[i].input_prompt_number == nbb_cell_id) {
                        if (nbb_cells[i].get_text() == nbb_unformatted_code) {
                             nbb_cells[i].set_text(nbb_formatted_code);
                        }
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }, 500);
            
</script>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">encoder_max_length_pickle_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="s2">"."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"data"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"fra-eng"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">version_name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"french_max_len.pkl"</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">decoder_max_length_pickle_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="s2">"."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"data"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"fra-eng"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">version_name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"english_max_len.pkl"</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">exists</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_max_length_pickle_path</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="ow">or</span> <span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">exists</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_max_length_pickle_path</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">encoder_max_len</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">max_length</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"input"</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">decoder_max_len</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">max_length</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"decoder_input"</span><span class="p">])</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_max_length_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"wb"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dump</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">protocol</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">HIGHEST_PROTOCOL</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">logger</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">debug</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">"Encoder max length saved at </span><span class="si">{encoder_max_length_pickle_path}</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_max_length_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"wb"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dump</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">protocol</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">HIGHEST_PROTOCOL</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">logger</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">debug</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">"Decoder max length saved at </span><span class="si">{decoder_max_length_pickle_path}</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_max_length_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"rb"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">encoder_max_len</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_max_length_pickle_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"rb"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">decoder_max_len</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pickle</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">load</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">handle</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">logger</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">debug</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">"Maximum Encoder seq length is </span><span class="si">{encoder_max_len}</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">logger</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">debug</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">f</span><span class="s2">"Maximum decoder Seq length is </span><span class="si">{decoder_max_len}</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="p">)</span>

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Data-Generator">Data Generator<a class="anchor-link" href="#Data-Generator">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [20]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">load_train_batches</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">BATCH_SIZE</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>

    <span class="k">while</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">:</span>

        <span class="c1"># retrieve the batch of input texts</span>
        <span class="n">input_train_text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"input"</span><span class="p">])[</span>
            <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="c1"># convert the extracted batch to sequences</span>
        <span class="n">train_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">texts_to_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">input_train_text</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># pad the input sequences to the max length</span>
        <span class="n">train_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pad_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maxlen</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">encoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">padding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"post"</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="c1"># retrieve the batch of decoder-input texts</span>
        <span class="n">target_train_input</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"decoder_input"</span><span class="p">])[</span>
            <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="c1"># convert the extracted batch to sequences</span>
        <span class="n">train_y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">texts_to_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">target_train_input</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># pad the sequences to the max length</span>
        <span class="n">train_y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pad_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maxlen</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">padding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"post"</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="c1"># retrieve the batch of decoder-input texts</span>
        <span class="n">target_train</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"decoder_target"</span><span class="p">])[</span>
            <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="c1"># convert the extracted batch to sequences</span>
        <span class="n">train_z</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">texts_to_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">target_train</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># pad the sequences to the max length</span>
        <span class="n">train_z</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pad_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_z</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maxlen</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">padding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"post"</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">decoder_targets_one_hot</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">decoder_num_words</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">dtype</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"float32"</span>
        <span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># assign the values</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">d</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">train_z</span><span class="p">):</span>
            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">t</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">word</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d</span><span class="p">):</span>
                <span class="n">decoder_targets_one_hot</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">t</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">word</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>

        <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">):</span>
            <span class="n">index_tracker</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
            <span class="n">data_train_texts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">shuffle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_train_texts</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="k">yield</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">train_x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">train_y</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">decoder_targets_one_hot</span>


<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">load_valid_batches</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_valid_texts</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">BATCH_SIZE</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>

    <span class="k">while</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">:</span>

        <span class="c1"># retrieve the batch of input texts</span>
        <span class="n">input_valid_text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_valid_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"input"</span><span class="p">])[</span>
            <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="c1"># convert the extracted batch to sequences</span>
        <span class="n">valid_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">texts_to_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">input_valid_text</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># pad the input sequences to the max length</span>
        <span class="n">valid_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pad_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">valid_x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maxlen</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">encoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">padding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"post"</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="c1"># retrieve the batch of decoder-input texts</span>
        <span class="n">target_valid_input</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_valid_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"decoder_input"</span><span class="p">])[</span>
            <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="c1"># convert the extracted batch to sequences</span>
        <span class="n">valid_y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">texts_to_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">target_valid_input</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># pad the sequences to the max length</span>
        <span class="n">valid_y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pad_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">valid_y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maxlen</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">padding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"post"</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="c1"># retrieve the batch of decoder-input texts</span>
        <span class="n">target_valid</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_valid_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"decoder_target"</span><span class="p">])[</span>
            <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="c1"># convert the extracted batch to sequences</span>
        <span class="n">valid_z</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">texts_to_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">target_valid</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># pad the sequences to the max length</span>
        <span class="n">valid_z</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pad_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">valid_z</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maxlen</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">padding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"post"</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">decoder_targets_one_hot_valid</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">valid_x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">decoder_num_words</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">dtype</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"float32"</span>
        <span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># assign the values</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">j</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">d1</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">valid_z</span><span class="p">):</span>
            <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">word</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">d1</span><span class="p">):</span>
                <span class="n">decoder_targets_one_hot_valid</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">j</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">k</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">word</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>

        <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">chunk_size</span>

        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_valid_texts</span><span class="p">):</span>
            <span class="n">valid_index_tracker</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
            <span class="n">data_valid_texts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">shuffle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_valid_texts</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="k">yield</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">valid_x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">valid_y</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">decoder_targets_one_hot_valid</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="output_subarea output_javascript">
<script type="text/javascript">
var element = $('#a3fd6fb0-6ee3-4118-b340-7a12b958166a');

retrieve the batch of input texts\n        input_valid_text = list(data_valid_texts[\"input\"])[\n            valid_index_tracker : valid_index_tracker + chunk_size\n        ]\n        # convert the extracted batch to sequences\n        valid_x = encoder_tokenizer.texts_to_sequences(input_valid_text)\n        # <div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="4.-Model-Definition-and-Training">4. Model Definition and Training<a class="anchor-link" href="#4.-Model-Definition-and-Training">¶</a></h2><p>The RNN units in Encoder and Decoder can be RNN,GRU or LSTM cells. In this notebook we use LSTM.The heart of LSTM is it’s cell which provides memory. The cell is made up of three types of gates</p>
<ul>
<li><p>Input Gate : Feeds the new information that we’re going to store in the cell state.</p>
</li>
<li><p>Output Gate : Provides the activation to the final output of the lstm block at timestamp ‘t’.</p>
</li>
<li><p>Forget Gate : Decides what information to throw away from the cell state.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<div>
<img src="images/machine_translation/LSTM.jpg"/>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The equations of the LSTM gates are :</p>
<blockquote><p><strong>$i_t$ = $\sigma$($w_i$[$h_{t-1}$,$x_t$]+$b_t$)       $f_t$ = $\sigma$($w_f$[$h_{t-1}$,$x_t$]+$b_f$)       $o_t$ = $\sigma$($w_o$[$h_{t-1}$,$x_t$]+$b_o$)</strong></p>
</blockquote>
<hr/>
<p>where,</p>
<p>$i_t$ $\Rightarrow$ represents input gate                         $f_t$ $\Rightarrow$ represents forget gate</p>
<p>$o_t$ $\Rightarrow$ represents output gate                       $\sigma$ $\Rightarrow$ represents sigmoid function</p>
<p>$w_x$ $\Rightarrow$ weight for the respective gate(x) neurons         $h_{t-1}$ $\Rightarrow$ weight for previous lstm block(at timestamp t-1)</p>
<p>$x_t$ $\Rightarrow$ input at current timestamp                     $b_x$ $\Rightarrow$ Biases for the respective gates(x)</p>
<hr/>
<p>The equations for the cell state, candidate cell state and the final output are :</p>
<blockquote><p><strong>$ \tilde{ct}$ = tanh($w_c$[$h_{t-1}$,$x_t$]+$b_c$)         $c_t$=$f_t$ <em> $c_{t-1}$ + $i_t$ </em> $\tilde{ct}$          $h_t$=$o_t$ * tanh($c^t$)</strong></p>
</blockquote>
<hr/>
<p>where,</p>
<p>$c_t$ $\Rightarrow$ cell state(memory) at timestamp(t)               $\tilde{ct}$ $\Rightarrow$ represents candidate for cell state at timestamp(t)</p>
<hr/>
<p><em>Note : </em> represents the element wise multiplication of the vectors.*</p>
<p>Lastly, we filter the cell state and then it is passed through the activation function which predicts what portion should appear as the output of current LSTM unit at timestamp t.</p>
<p>We can pass this $h_t$ the output from current lstm block through the softmax layer to get the predicted output ($y_t$) from the current block.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [30]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># ENCODER</span>
<span class="n">input_len</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,)</span>
<span class="n">encoder_input_layer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">input_len</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># pass the input to emedding layer</span>
<span class="n">encoder_embedding_layer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Embedding</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_num_words</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">LATENT_DIM</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">encoder_embedding</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">encoder_embedding_layer</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_input_layer</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># Create a LSTM encoder and pass the input embeddings to it</span>
<span class="n">encoder_lstm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LSTM</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">LATENT_DIM</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">return_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">encoder_outputs</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state_h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state_c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">encoder_lstm</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_embedding</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># save the hidden states of the encoder</span>
<span class="n">encoder_states</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state_h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state_c</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="c1"># DECODER</span>
<span class="n">target_len</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,)</span>
<span class="n">decoder_input_layer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">target_len</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># pass the input to emedding layer</span>
<span class="n">decoder_embedding_layer</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Embedding</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_num_words</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">LATENT_DIM</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">decoder_embedding</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_embedding_layer</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_input_layer</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1"># Create a LSTM encoder and pass the input embeddings to it</span>
<span class="c1"># return states in the training model, but we will use them in inference.</span>
<span class="n">decoder_lstm</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">LSTM</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">LATENT_DIM</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">return_sequences</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">return_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">decoder_outputs</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">_</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_lstm</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_embedding</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">initial_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">encoder_states</span><span class="p">)</span>


<span class="n">decoder_dense</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Dense</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_num_words</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">activation</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"softmax"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">decoder_outputs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_dense</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_outputs</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div id="b8b34baa-acbe-41ae-a1eb-8e9d565bb8c6"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_javascript">
<script type="text/javascript">
var element = $('#b8b34baa-acbe-41ae-a1eb-8e9d565bb8c6');

                var nbb_unformatted_code = "# ENCODER\ninput_len = (encoder_max_len,)\nencoder_input_layer = Input(shape=input_len)\n# pass the input to emedding layer\nencoder_embedding_layer = Embedding(encoder_num_words, LATENT_DIM)\nencoder_embedding = encoder_embedding_layer(encoder_input_layer)\n# Create a LSTM encoder and pass the input embeddings to it\nencoder_lstm = LSTM(LATENT_DIM, return_state=True)\nencoder_outputs, state_h, state_c = encoder_lstm(encoder_embedding)\n# save the hidden states of the encoder\nencoder_states = [state_h, state_c]\n\n# DECODER\ntarget_len = (decoder_max_len,)\ndecoder_input_layer = Input(shape=target_len)\n# pass the input to emedding layer\ndecoder_embedding_layer = Embedding(decoder_num_words, LATENT_DIM)\ndecoder_embedding = decoder_embedding_layer(decoder_input_layer)\n# Create a LSTM encoder and pass the input embeddings to it\n# return states in the training model, but we will use them in inference.\ndecoder_lstm = LSTM(LATENT_DIM, return_sequences=True, return_state=True)\ndecoder_outputs, _, _ = decoder_lstm(decoder_embedding, initial_state=encoder_states)\n\n\ndecoder_dense = Dense(decoder_num_words, activation=\"softmax\")\ndecoder_outputs = decoder_dense(decoder_outputs)";

    <span class="n">es</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">EarlyStopping</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">monitor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'val_loss'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mode</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'min'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">verbose</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">patience</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>

                                          <span class="n">validation_data</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">valid_gen</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                          <span class="n">validation_steps</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ceil</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_valid_texts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">BATCH_SIZE</span><span class="p">)),</span>

    <span class="c1"># summarize history for loss</span>

    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">machine_translate</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">history</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'val_loss'</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'model loss'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<div>
<img align="left" src="images/machine_translation/evaluation_graph.png"/>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="5.-Inference">5. Inference<a class="anchor-link" href="#5.-Inference">¶</a></h2><p>After the model is trained, it can be used to generate new sequences. To do that, we should  feed a ”\< sos > ” token to the Decoder RNN along with the intermediate representation of the source sentence from the Encoder. The generated word in the output sequence will then be used as input on the subsequent time step along with the hidden states. The generation process will continue until the ”\< eos >” token is reached, or a maximum sequence length is reached.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [24]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">encoder_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Model</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">encoder_input_layer</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">encoder_states</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">state_input_h</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">LATENT_DIM</span><span class="p">,))</span>
<span class="n">state_input_c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">LATENT_DIM</span><span class="p">,))</span>
<span class="n">states_inputs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state_input_h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state_input_c</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">decoder_inputs_word</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">shape</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,))</span>

<span class="n">decoder_inputs_word_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_embedding_layer</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_inputs_word</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">decoder_outputs</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state_h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state_c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_lstm</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">decoder_inputs_word_x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">initial_state</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">states_inputs</span>
<span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">decoder_states</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">state_h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">state_c</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">decoder_outputs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_dense</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_outputs</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">decoder_model</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Model</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">decoder_inputs_word</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">states_inputs</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">decoder_outputs</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">decoder_states</span>
<span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div id="25b05d43-8291-4db7-88c2-fde60ecca218"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_javascript">
<script type="text/javascript">
var element = $('#25b05d43-8291-4db7-88c2-fde60ecca218');

            setTimeout(function() {
                var nbb_cell_id = 24;
                var nbb_unformatted_code = "encoder_model = Model(encoder_input_layer, encoder_states)\n\nstate_input_h = Input(shape=(LATENT_DIM,))\nstate_input_c = Input(shape=(LATENT_DIM,))\nstates_inputs = [state_input_h, state_input_c]\n\ndecoder_inputs_word = Input(shape=(1,))\n\ndecoder_inputs_word_x = decoder_embedding_layer(decoder_inputs_word)\n\ndecoder_outputs, state_h, state_c = decoder_lstm(\n    decoder_inputs_word_x, initial_state=states_inputs\n)\n\ndecoder_states = [state_h, state_c]\n\ndecoder_outputs = decoder_dense(decoder_outputs)\n\ndecoder_model = Model(\n    [decoder_inputs_word] + states_inputs, [decoder_outputs] + decoder_states\n)";
                var nbb_formatted_code = "encoder_model = Model(encoder_input_layer, encoder_states)\n\nstate_input_h = Input(shape=(LATENT_DIM,))\nstate_input_c = Input(shape=(LATENT_DIM,))\nstates_inputs = [state_input_h, state_input_c]\n\ndecoder_inputs_word = Input(shape=(1,))\n\ndecoder_inputs_word_x = decoder_embedding_layer(decoder_inputs_word)\n\ndecoder_outputs, state_h, state_c = decoder_lstm(\n    decoder_inputs_word_x, initial_state=states_inputs\n)\n\ndecoder_states = [state_h, state_c]\n\ndecoder_outputs = decoder_dense(decoder_outputs)\n\ndecoder_model = Model(\n    [decoder_inputs_word] + states_inputs, [decoder_outputs] + decoder_states\n)";
                var nbb_cells = Jupyter.notebook.get_cells();
                for (var i = 0; i < nbb_cells.length; ++i) {
                    if (nbb_cells[i].input_prompt_number == nbb_cell_id) {
                        if (nbb_cells[i].get_text() == nbb_unformatted_code) {
                             nbb_cells[i].set_text(nbb_formatted_code);
                        }
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }, 500);
            
</script>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [27]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">decode_sequence1</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">test_sen</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="c1"># Encode the input as state vectors.</span>
    <span class="n">states_value</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">encoder_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">test_sen</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">target_seq</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">zeros</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">target_seq</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_word2idx</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'<sos>'</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="n">eos</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_word2idx</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'<eos>'</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="n">output_sentence</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">_</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">decoder_max_len</span><span class="p">):</span>
        
        <span class="n">output_tokens</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">predict</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="n">target_seq</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">states_value</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">argmax</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">output_tokens</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">:])</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">eos</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="k">break</span>

        <span class="n">word</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">''</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">idx</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
            <span class="n">word</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decoder_idx2word</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">idx</span><span class="p">]</span>
            <span class="n">output_sentence</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">word</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="c1"># Update the decoder input</span>
        <span class="c1"># which is just the word just generated</span>
        <span class="n">target_seq</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">idx</span>

        <span class="c1"># Update states</span>
        <span class="n">states_value</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">h</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">" "</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">output_sentence</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [38]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">evaluate_test_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_test_texts</span><span class="p">):</span>

    <span class="n">predicted_results</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Input_Sentence"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Target_Sentence"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Predicted_Sentence"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">seq_idx</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_test_texts</span><span class="p">)):</span>
        <span class="c1"># retrieve the batch of input texts</span>
        <span class="n">input_test_text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_test_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"input"</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="n">seq_idx</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">seq_idx</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="n">target_test_text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_test_texts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"target"</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="n">seq_idx</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">seq_idx</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
        <span class="c1"># convert the extracted batch to sequences</span>
        <span class="n">test_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">encoder_tokenizer</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">texts_to_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">input_test_text</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="c1"># pad the input sequences to the max length</span>
        <span class="n">test_x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pad_sequences</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">test_x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">maxlen</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">encoder_max_len</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">padding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">"post"</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">decoded_sentence</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">decode_sequence1</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">test_x</span><span class="p">)</span>

        <span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">seq_idx</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span>
            <span class="n">data_test_texts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">seq_idx</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"input"</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">data_test_texts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">seq_idx</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">"target"</span><span class="p">],</span>
            <span class="n">decoded_sentence</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">predicted_results</span>

<span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">evaluate_test_data</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_test_texts</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="6.-Model-Evaluation">6. Model Evaluation<a class="anchor-link" href="#6.-Model-Evaluation">¶</a></h2><p>Now we have to provide a single numerical score to the translation generated which tells us how "good" our translation is when compared to the reference values.</p>
<h3 id="Bilingual-Evaluation-Understudy---BLEU-Score">Bilingual Evaluation Understudy - BLEU Score<a class="anchor-link" href="#Bilingual-Evaluation-Understudy---BLEU-Score">¶</a></h3><p>BLEU is the standard machine translation (MT) evaluation metric which compares the machine generated translation to the set of good quality reference translations and counts the number of matches in a weighted fashion .BLEU score ranges between 0 and 1. The more the number of matches, the closer our translation is to the reference translations, the more BLEU score tends to 1.  BLEU score is calculated on n-gram model.</p>
\begin{equation} 
P_n\ =\ \frac{\sum_{ngram}\ Count\_Clip(n-gram)}{\sum_{ngram}\ Count(n-gram)} 
\end{equation}\begin{equation}
Bleu\ Score\ =\ (B_p)\ *\ exp(\frac{1}{n}\ *\sum{1,n}P_n)
\end{equation}<p>where $B_p$ is the Brevity Penalty which is calculated as,</p>
$$
f(n)=
\begin{cases}
1&\mbox{if translation}\ output\ length > ref\ output\ length\\
\exp(1 - \frac{ref-output\ length}{translation-output\ length}),&\mbox{otherwise}\\
\end{cases}
$$
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [44]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">calculate_sent_bleu</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="p">):</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># initialize lists for tracking bleu scores</span>
    <span class="n">bleu_1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bleu_2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bleu_3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bleu_4</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">()]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">4</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="p">)):</span>
        <span class="n">hypothesis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'Target_Sentence'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="n">list_of_ref</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'Predicted_Sentence'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">()]</span>
        <span class="n">bleu_1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sentence_bleu</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_of_ref</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hypothesis</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">weights</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">smoothing_function</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">SmoothingFunction</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">method2</span><span class="p">))</span>
        <span class="n">bleu_2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sentence_bleu</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_of_ref</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hypothesis</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">weights</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">smoothing_function</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">SmoothingFunction</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">method2</span><span class="p">))</span>
        <span class="n">bleu_3</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sentence_bleu</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_of_ref</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hypothesis</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">weights</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.33</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.33</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.33</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">smoothing_function</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">SmoothingFunction</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">method2</span><span class="p">))</span>
        <span class="n">bleu_4</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sentence_bleu</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_of_ref</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hypothesis</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">weights</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mf">0.25</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.25</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.25</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mf">0.25</span><span class="p">),</span><span class="n">smoothing_function</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">SmoothingFunction</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">method2</span><span class="p">))</span>
        
    <span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Bleu_1'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">bleu_1</span>
    <span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Bleu_2'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">bleu_2</span>
    <span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Bleu_3'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">bleu_3</span>
    <span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Bleu_4'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">bleu_4</span>
    
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">predicted_results</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [45]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">result_try</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">calculate_sent_bleu</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">predicted_results</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"BlEU-1 :  "</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_try</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Bleu_1"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"BlEU-2 :  "</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_try</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Bleu_2"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"BlEU-3 :  "</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_try</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Bleu_3"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"BlEU-4 :  "</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">result_try</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"Bleu_4"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

        "MathJax.Hub.Config({" +
        "    config: ['MMLorHTML.js']," +
        "    TeX: { extensions: ['AMSmath.js','AMSsymbols.js','noErrors.js','noUndefined.js'], equationNumbers: { autoNumber: 'AMS' } }," +
        "    jax: ['input/TeX','input/MathML','output/HTML-CSS']," +
        "    extensions: ['tex2jax.js','mml2jax.js','MathMenu.js','MathZoom.js']," +
        "    displayAlign: 'center'," +
        "    displayIndent: '0em'," +
        "    showMathMenu: true," +
        "    tex2jax: { " +
        "        inlineMath: [ ['$','$'] ], " +
        "        displayMath: [ ['$$','$$'] ]," +
        "        processEscapes: true," +
        "        preview: 'TeX'," +
        "    }, " +
        "    'HTML-CSS': { " +
        " linebreaks: { automatic: true, width: '95% container' }, " +
        "        styles: { '.MathJax_Display, .MathJax .mo, .MathJax .mi, .MathJax .mn': {color: 'black ! important'} }" +
        "    } " +
        "}); ";
    (document.body || document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0]).appendChild(mathjaxscript);
}
</script>

entry.title: KL Divergence in VAE - Closed form Solution
entry.id: tag:jadhavpritish.github.io,2019-12-15:/KL Divergence in VAE - Closed form Solution.html
entry.summary: KL divergence is used to compare probability distribution functions. This article focuses on deriving a closed form solution for KL divergence using in Variational Autoencoders.

  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}

  box-shadow: none;
}

  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

  font-weight: bold;
  color: red;
}

}

}






.rendered_html h1:first-child {

}

.rendered_html ol:not(.list-inline) {

}

  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html * + ol {
  margin-top: 1em;
}





.rendered_html pre,




.rendered_html tr,
.rendered_html th,


.rendered_html tbody tr:nth-child(odd) {
  background: #f5f5f5;
}

}

  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + p {
  margin-top: 1em;
}

.rendered_html * + img {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
.rendered_html img,

.rendered_html img.unconfined,


.rendered_html * + .alert {

}
